main event: Multiple civilian sightings of a white, round, high-altitude object resembling a parachute over Dayton, Ohio on April 4, 1949.
interesting points: The object was observed to be 1/4 the size of the moon and appeared to travel at high speeds before disappearing behind trees.
No sound or odor was detected in association with the object.
Witnesses reported observing reflected sunlight giving the object a bright and shiny appearance.
The object was seen traveling in a straight line with no apparent maneuvers before fading from sight.
There were multiple reports of the same object from different observers in the same area.
sighted object: white, round, high-altitude object resembling a parachute
